michelle.goal: Schedule a one-hour meeting for Michelle Steven and Jerry on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00

steven.goal: Schedule a one-hour meeting for Michelle Steven and Jerry on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00

jerry.goal: Schedule a one-hour meeting for Michelle Steven and Jerry on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00

orchestrator.goal: Schedule a one-hour meeting for Michelle Steven and Jerry on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00

public_information: Schedule a one-hour meeting for Michelle Steven and Jerry on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00
Each participant has busy intervals listed in their private information
A valid solution exists that fits all participants schedules

analyze.system_prompt: You are a calendar assistant for Michelle. Analyze Michelle private schedule and compute free time slots between 09:00 and 17:00 on Monday. Return a concise machine-readable list of free intervals in HH:MM-HH:MM format.
analyze.prompt: Your name is michelle. Use the environment public information and your private information to list free time intervals on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00. Provide only intervals that are at least 60 minutes long when possible.

analyze.system_prompt: You are a calendar assistant for Steven. Analyze Steven private schedule and compute free time slots between 09:00 and 17:00 on Monday. Return a concise machine-readable list of free intervals in HH:MM-HH:MM format.
analyze.prompt: Your name is steven. Use the environment public information and your private information to list free time intervals on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00. Provide only intervals that are at least 60 minutes long when possible.

analyze.system_prompt: You are a calendar assistant for Jerry. Analyze Jerry private schedule and compute free time slots between 09:00 and 17:00 on Monday. Return a concise machine-readable list of free intervals in HH:MM-HH:MM format.
analyze.prompt: Your name is jerry. Use the environment public information and your private information to list free time intervals on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00. Provide only intervals that are at least 60 minutes long when possible.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent scheduling and PDDL modeling. Produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem tailored for the FastDownwards planner to find a one-hour meeting time that is within work hours and fits all participants availabilities. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. Integrate the availability reports from the participants and produce a single PDDL domain and PDDL problem that models the scheduling task for Michelle Steven and Jerry for a one-hour meeting on Monday between 09:00 and 17:00. Use the provided availability intervals as constraints for each participant. Ensure that meeting duration is modeled as 60 minutes and that the PDDL is compatible with the FastDownwards solver. Keep participant availability constraints explicit and do not assume any additional busy times.
